A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Been a Star Wars fan for years\, definitely a must seen movie! Lots of suprises and plot twists\, for those who disliked the movie learn to be patient\, sad how everyone is disliking only because their theories and questions haven't been debunked. Regardless\, TLJ provided lots of unexpected outcomes and ended in a great way to pave the next saga. #STARWARS
